Where Allergy Woes Find Their End.
settings.text: Unmatched Coverage For All Your Needs.

settings.title: Congestion Relief:
settings.text: They quickly alleviate nasal congestion caused by colds, allergies, or sinusitis, improving breathing and comfort.

settings.title: Allergy Management:
settings.text: Nasal sprays with antihistamines or steroids help manage allergy symptoms like sneezing, itching, and runny nose.

settings.title: Moisturization:
settings.text: Saline sprays hydrate dry nasal passages, preventing irritation and nosebleeds.

settings.title: Preventive Care:
settings.text: Nasal sprays tap into the rich vascular network of the nasal passages, ensuring rapid absorption and quick onset of medication action.

settings.title: Postoperative Care:
settings.text: They aid in healing after nasal surgeries by reducing inflammation and promoting drainage.

settings.title: Enhanced Medication Delivery:
settings.text: Nasal sprays directly target affected areas, avoiding the need for oral medication and reducing side effects.

settings.title: Quick Pain Relief:
settings.text: Nasal sprays provide rapid relief from congestion and discomfort.

settings.title: Nasal Spray Facts
settings.text: Why use nasal spray?

settings.text1: Delivers a saline solution to cleanse and moisturise nasal passages, relieving dryness and congestion.
settings.title: Bibo’s Offering: Bibo Saline Nasal Spray
settings.text2: This innovative saline nasal spray is the world’s first formulation that combines tulsi and xylitol. It is a patent-pending formulation with published articles.
settings.product_text: For daily nasal rinse to wash away allergens and keep the nasal passage clean.

settings.text1: Provides quick relief by constricting blood vessels, reducing nasal swelling, and improving airflow. This is commonly used for short-term congestion.
settings.title: Bibo’s Offering: Bibo Coldlyte Oxy Spray
settings.text2: Contains anti-histamine that instantly relieves blocked nose and nasal congestion due to common cold, sinusitis, hay fever, or other allergic conditions.
settings.product_text: Starts to unblock nose in 25 sec. Shortens duration of symptoms of cold, allergies & nasal congestion by 2 days.

settings.text1: It contains corticosteroids that reduce inflammation and relieve nasal congestion, allergies, and sinus symptoms effectively.
settings.title: Bibo’s Offering: Bibonase Nasal Spray
settings.text2: It contains Azelastine hydrochloride (antihistamine) and Fluticasone propionate (corticosteroid) that reduces the inflammation in the nasal and sinus areas and helps relieve allergy symptoms.
settings.product_text: Relieves allergy symptoms such as runny or blocked nose, sneezing, nasal congestion, itchy or watery eyes, etc.

settings.title: How  Bibo Nasal Sprays  Works?
settings.caption: Direct pathway to deliver drug to lungs.
settings.text: Nasal sprays employ a molecular mechanism that directly treats damaged areas without liver metabolism. This precise topical application allows for quick absorption, reducing inflammation and promoting healing at the specific site of injury or irritation, providing effective local relief.
